articles.title: News24 | CSA boss Nkwe explains Nortje contract omission: He wants to focus on T20 Cricket
articles.description: Anrich Nortje last played international cricket in September last year, from where he suffered an injury that ruled him out of the World Cup and the entire South African summer.
articles.content: Anrich Nortje last played international cricket in September last year, from where he suffered an injury that ruled him out of the World Cup and the entire South African summer.

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
